text: this drop of water falling on soil is
about to liberate the smell of rain
which actually comes from the earth not
the water the scientists at MIT who made
this video knew that much what they
didn't know but have now captured on
video is how it happens you have to have
the right sized drop falling at the
right speed on the right surface as it
hits the ground it traps tiny bubbles of
air those bubbles then burst from the
drop like fizz from champagne and they
carry with them the smell of the earth
or the rain washed pavement or wherever
they fall these bubbles are not just
capturing the molecules in the earth
that smell good they could also be
transporting viruses or bacteria that
cause diseases so it's bound to be
useful to learn more about how it works
Oh
